name: Omertex
tagline: Let's put your great ideas into practice!
description:
Omertex is a Minsk-based technology solutions provider for small and large businesses to address complex business challenges.
We provide solutions by creating complex enterprise products and applications based on: Angular 2+, React.js, .Net, AndroidÂ & iOS, Node.js, etc. We also provide a wide range of services to clients including the development, implementation, and support of IT solutions.
Founded in 2008, Omertex has quickly expanded and gained the reputation as an energetic, prosperous, and fast growing tech company with a transparent atmosphere, a professional attitude, and highly skilled certified developers.
We would love to put your great ideas into practice! Let's do it!
